cmp: 几 (small table, almost, a few/how many, how much/how many/several/a few)

exm.mng: (onom.) chirp, twitter, buzzing, to chatter continuously
(bird species of China) mountain chiffchaff (Phylloscopus sindianus)
exm.pyn: dōng fāng jī zǎ liǔ yīng

exm.mng: see 嘰哩咕嚕|叽哩咕噜[ji1 li5 gu1 lu1]
(bird species of China) common chiffchaff (Phylloscopus collybita)
(dialect) to dawdle, to waste time, also written 墨跡|墨迹[mo4 ji5]
